meanings.definition: A person who throws or tosses something.
meanings.sent1: The baseball team's best flingers practiced their throws every day.
meanings.sent2: The flingers at the carnival booth tried to knock down the stacked cans with their throws.
meanings.sent3: The flingers at the food fight were having a blast tossing mashed potatoes around.
meanings.sent4: The flingers of ideas in the brainstorming session came up with innovative solutions.
meanings.sent5: The flingers in the water balloon fight were strategic in their aim and timing.

meanings.definition: The act of throwing or tossing something.
meanings.sent1: The flingers of confetti made the parade even more festive.
meanings.sent2: The flingers of frisbees enjoyed a sunny day at the park.
meanings.sent3: The flingers of paint splattered colors across the canvas in an abstract pattern.
meanings.sent4: The flingers of insults in the argument escalated the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The flingers of seeds in the garden ensured a bountiful harvest in the fall.
